admission_text:
# Membership

## Community Membership

Becoming a Community Member is as easy as saying, “I’m in!” 

Community Membership is your all-access pass to the vibrant, ever-growing arts scene in the greater Corvallis area. You’ll be the first to know about exciting events, exclusive art calls, hands-on workshops, and endless ways to connect with fellow creatives through the TAC newsletter and email updates. All it takes is your email and a love for the arts!

[Newsletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20250918061756/https://secure.theartscenter.net/forms/createaccount)

## Contributing Membership

Looking to support us with a donation? We’ve made things even easier for you! With an annual donation of $50 or more, you’ll continue to enjoy all the benefits of being a Community Member, and your contribution will be fully tax deductible.

[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20250918061756/https://theartscenter.net/donate/)

## **pART** ners

### **Join pARTners and become a** **pARTner in our creative community!**

The Arts Center is more than just a location—it’s your creative home! TAC is a go-to destination for all things art, a vibrant hub where creativity thrives, connections grow, and the arts come together to form a vibrant community.

To expand opportunities and amplify the voices of our local arts scene, The Arts Center is excited to launch _pARTners_ —a dynamic initiative designed to unite and uplift the arts in our community. T _he pARTners_ program is open to all greater C...
